I am using the Presentation Model to display a Grid. Using the approach outlined in this article:
http://blogs.southworks.net/jdominguez/2008/05/first-approach-to-presentation-model-with-datatemplates/ 
I have a presentation model that binds to a DataTemplate that contains the grid. I can display the data fine and edit, however I want to use the event aggregation mechanism to update a different grid when a row is selected in the first grid.
How do I get hook up the SelectionChanged event in the grid so I can then publish the change?
